name: Private & Group Lessons
short_description: Personalized and group yoga lessons for all levels.
long_description: Our private and group yoga lessons cater to both individuals looking for personalized instruction and groups wanting to practice together. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced yogi, our certified instructors will guide you on your yoga journey with care and expertise. Join us today to experience the joy of yoga.

name: Yoga for Pregnant
short_description: Safe and gentle yoga for expectant mothers.
long_description: Our yoga for pregnant women is designed to support you during this special time in your life. With gentle poses and breathing exercises, our classes provide a safe and nurturing environment for expectant mothers to relax, stretch, and connect with their bodies and babies. Embrace the beauty of pregnancy with us.

name: Yoga for Beginners
long_description: New to yoga? Our Yoga for Beginners classes are perfect for those who are just starting their yoga journey. Learn the fundamentals of yoga poses, alignment, and breathing techniques in a supportive and friendly atmosphere. Discover the path to health and well-being.

name: Yoga Barre
short_description: Combine yoga and barre for a total body workout.
long_description: Yoga Barre combines the best of yoga and barre fitness for a unique and effective total body workout. Strengthen your core, improve flexibility, and tone your muscles while enjoying the mind-body benefits of yoga. Elevate your fitness journey with us.

name: Yoga Core
short_description: Focus on strengthening your core with yoga.
long_description: Yoga Core is designed to target and strengthen your core muscles through a series of yoga poses and exercises. Build a strong and stable foundation while enhancing your overall yoga practice. Transform your body and mind with us.

name: Yoga Restore
short_description: Relax and restore your body and mind.
long_description: Yoga Restore offers a gentle and restorative yoga experience, perfect for those seeking relaxation and stress relief. Unwind and rejuvenate with calming poses, deep stretches, and mindful breathing techniques. Rediscover tranquility with us.
